properties.description:
This rule detects a new service account sign in that has not been previously observed in the past 30 days
This is in the early stages - reach out to James for tuning

Handling Guidance: https://costar-group-prod-dev.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SCSP/pages/390039244/General+Incident+Report+Handling+Guidance

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: {{{AccountName}} was observed signing into {{DeviceName}} and this has not been seen in the last 30 days
